statements: UPDATE savings SET current_amount = 1500.50, last_updated = '2022-12-31' WHERE goal_id = 1
UPDATE savings SET target_amount = 2000.00, current_amount = 1000.00 WHERE goal_id = 2
UPDATE savings SET current_amount = current_amount + 1000 WHERE goal_id = 1;
UPDATE savings SET current_amount = target_amount * 0.75, last_updated = NOW() WHERE goal_id = 2;
UPDATE savings_goals SET target_amount = 5000.00, progress_percentage = 50.00 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET description = 'Grocery Shopping' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE savings_goals SET progress_percentage = 50, completed = true WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount * 1.1, description = 'Updated Transaction' WHERE savings_goal_id = 2;
UPDATE savings SET current_amount = 5000, progress = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE savings_updates SET updated_amount = 6000.75 WHERE savings_id = 2;
UPDATE savings SET current_amount = current_amount + 500, progress = current_amount / target_amount * 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE savings_updates SET updated_amount = updated_amount - 100, update_date = now() WHERE savings_id = 1;
UPDATE savings SET current_amount = 1500 WHERE user_id = 101 AND goal_name = 'Emergency Fund';
UPDATE user_settings SET email_notifications = FALSE, weekly_report = TRUE WHERE user_id = 201;
UPDATE savings SET goal_progress = goal_progress + 10 WHERE user_id = 123 AND goal_name = 'Retirement Fund';
UPDATE savings_history SET date = '2022-10-01', action_type = 'deposit' WHERE user_id = 456 AND goal_name = 'Emergency Fund'
UPDATE Savings SET current_amount = current_amount + 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Transactions SET transaction_amount = 100.50, transaction_type = 'Deposit' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Savings SET current_amount = current_amount + 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Transactions SET transaction_type = 'Expense' WHERE savings_id = 1 AND transaction_amount > 100;
